a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTHib3DosesLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Hib.3 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 3 primary doses without a booster dose (3p) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTHib3DosesLogic

def.name: Today
Patient
Patient
Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

"The latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago"

def.name: Client is not due for Hib vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for Hib vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first Hib dose as client\'s age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.'
"Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second Hib dose as latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for second dose.'
"Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third Hib dose as latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third dose.'
"Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 4"
'Should not vaccinate client with Hib dose as client is more than 5 years old and Hib vaccination is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years. Check for any other vaccines due.'

when.name: Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with first Hib dose as client's age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.

when.name: Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second Hib dose as latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for second dose.

when.name: Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with third Hib dose as latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third dose.

when.name: Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 4

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with Hib dose as client is more than 5 years old and Hib vaccination is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for Hib vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first Hib dose as no Hib doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for Hib vaccination Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with second Hib dose as client\'s age was less than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered and the latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for Hib vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client with third Hib dose as client is within appropriate age range and latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'

then.value: Should vaccinate client with third Hib dose as client is within appropriate age range and latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

def.name: Hib immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hib immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:s.a:s: 'Hib immunization schedule is complete as client\'s age was more than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered. One Hib primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
'Hib immunization schedule is complete. Three Hib primary series doses were administered. Check for any vaccines due.'

when.name: Hib immunization schedule is complete Case 1

then.value: Hib immunization schedule is complete as client's age was more than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered. One Hib primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

when.name: Hib immunization schedule is complete Case 2

then.value: Hib immunization schedule is complete. Three Hib primary series doses were administered. Check for any vaccines due.

def.name: Test Validation

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first Hib dose as client\'s age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.'
"Client is due for Hib vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first Hib dose as no Hib doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second Hib dose as latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for second dose.'
"Client is due for Hib vaccination Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with second Hib dose as client\'s age was less than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered and the latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
'Hib immunization schedule is complete as client\'s age was more than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered. One Hib primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
"Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third Hib dose as latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third dose.'
"Client is due for Hib vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client with third Hib dose as client is within appropriate age range and latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
'Hib immunization schedule is complete. Three Hib primary series doses were administered. Check for any vaccines due.'
"Client is not due for Hib vaccination Case 4"
'Should not vaccinate client with Hib dose as client is more than 5 years old and Hib vaccination is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years. Check for any other vaccines due.'
